title: A clause must be included by the owner/developer in the purchase agreement with the purchaser, owner of the premises/organization or society of the occupiers or the society of purchasers stating that recycled waste water system has been provided in the development and shall have to be maintained in good condition as per the requirements of MPCB, if any
clause_text: A clause must be included by the owner/developer in the purchase agreement with the purchaser, owner of the premises/organization or society of the occupiers or the society of purchasers stating that recycled waste water system has been provided in the development and shall have to be maintained in good condition as per the requirements of MPCB, if any.
